init_data: INSERT INTO Sensor (sensor_id, sensor_name, descriptions) VALUES (0, 'BH1750', 'light sensor'), (1, 'HC-SR04', 'distance sensor')
add_light_value: INSERT INTO Sensor_value (sensor_id, sensor_value, measure, time_stamp) VALUES (0, ?, 'lux', DATETIME('now'))
add_distance_value: INSERT INTO Sensor_value (sensor_id, sensor_value, measure, time_stamp) VALUES (1, ?, 'cm', DATETIME('now'))
